c1.name: To Cloister Compassion
c1.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite</color>'s AoE is increased by 50%.
c1.description: Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite's AoE is increased by 50%.

c2.name: To Forsake Fortune
c2.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Grass Ring of Sanctification</color>'s duration is increased by 3s.
c2.description: Grass Ring of Sanctification's duration is increased by 3s.

c3.name: To Sequester Sorrow
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sanctifying Ring</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Sanctifying Ring by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: To Sever Sealing
c4.descriptionRaw:
When the Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks of the character affected by Shinobu's <color=#FFD780FF>Grass Ring of Sanctification</color> hit opponents, a Thundergrass Mark will land on the opponent's position and deal <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> based on 9.7% of Shinobu's Max HP.
This effect can occur once every 5s.
c4.description:
When the Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks of the character affected by Shinobu's Grass Ring of Sanctification hit opponents, a Thundergrass Mark will land on the opponent's position and deal AoE Electro DMG based on 9.7% of Shinobu's Max HP.
This effect can occur once every 5s.

c5.name: To Cease Courtesies
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: To Ward Weakness
c6.descriptionRaw:
When Kuki Shinobu takes lethal DMG, this instance of DMG will not take her down. This effect will automatically trigger when her HP reaches 1 and will trigger once every 60s.
When Shinobu's HP drops below 25%, she will gain 150 Elemental Mastery for 15s. This effect will trigger once every 60s.
